title: Monster (Hack'EM)/Full list
data:
This page lists all of the [monsters](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that are in [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). An automated script scrapes all of this info directly from the Hack'EM source.

Some of these monsters might vary from their representations in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")* or in other variants. Note that most of the information presented here can be obtained about any creature in Hack'EM by using the [far look](/wiki/Far_look "Far look") command.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"Bring up to date with 1.3.1"*

Monster (Hack'EM)/Full list

From NetHackWiki
< Monster (Hack'EM)
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This page lists all of the monsters that are in Hack'EM. An automated script scrapes all of this info directly from the Hack'EM source.

Some of these monsters might vary from their representations in NetHack or in other variants. Note that most of the information presented here can be obtained about any creature in Hack'EM by using the far look command.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"Bring up to date with 1.3.1"

rawPage:
This page lists all of the [[monster]]s that are in [[Hack'EM]]. An automated script scrapes all of this info directly from the Hack'EM source. Some of these monsters might vary from their representations in ''[[NetHack]]'' or in other variants.
